name: Pushamo
description:
Pushamo is an addicting block-pushing game where you clear blocks by forming 3x3 or larger rectangles. A simple but challenging task that will require quick thinking, precision, strategy. and even a bit of luck.

Made for Low Rez Jam

INSTRUCTIONS

Arrow keys: Move around

Z/X: Activate first and second items, menu selection

Ctrl+R: Reboot

ITEMS

You have access to a small number of items and abilities to help you get the best score possible. You are able to mix and match any two. so try them all out to see what best suits your playstyle!

  • DASH // 7 second cooldown // Increase your movement speed
  • LASER // 20 seconds // Unleash immense energy to destroy a large amount of blocks
  • GHOST FRIEND // 10 // Your pal will help you phase through blocks
  • EXPLOSIVES // 24 // Create a pushable bomb that will destroy anything in a 5x5 region
  • COIN // 12 // Gain points!!
  • AXE // 8 // Destroy the square in front of you
  • BULLDOZER // 16 // Quickly blast through all blocks in a straight line until you hit an edge
  • BLOCK // 10 // Create a block in front of you that can be used for clears
  • LUCKY DICE // 16 // Destroy all moving blocks, then spawn a new one for each
  • PORTALS // 16 // Set down a portal, then use it again at a later point to teleport instantly to that spot!
